examples.prompt: A hyper-realistic, cinematic fashion photograph captured from a first-person perspective, looking straight down at a smartphone held naturally in both hands.Use the uploaded reference image as a strict visual reference for BOTH:the miniature character emerging from the phone screenthe real-world person holding the phone (first-person POV)Both must represent the same individual.Do not redesign, reinterpret, stylize, or modify the appearance or outfit in any way.Facial features, hairstyle, skin tone, age, proportions, expression, clothing design, colors, materials, footwear, and overall look must match the reference image exactly for both versions.A surreal forced-perspective illusion: a miniature version of the same character physically emerges out of the smartphone screen, seamlessly blending the digital and real worlds.Her upper body and one leg extend outside the screen, while the rest of her body remains inside, maintaining perfect scale, believable depth, and realistic physical interaction.Her foot lightly rests on the edge of the glass screen, casting a soft, natural shadow onto the phone surface.The glass shows subtle reflections, refraction, and depth distortion where her body breaks through, enhancing realism.The character’s posture and expression remain consistent with the reference image—confident, natural, and composed—appearing fully aware of the viewer, as if calmly stepping into her own real-world perspective.The real-world environment features textured gray cobblestone pavement beneath the phone.The hands holding the smartphone belong to the same person shown in the reference image, wearing the exact same outfit and footwear, visible naturally within the frame without emphasis or redesign.At the bottom of the frame, parts of the holder’s lower body and shoes are visible, reinforcing that the viewer and the emerging character are the same individual, creating a mirrored self-interaction effect.Inside the phone screen, faint UI-style doodles and social icons (small hearts, stars, smiley faces) remain subtly visible behind the emerging figure, partially obscured by her body to enhance depth realism rather than floating unnaturally.Lighting is soft natural daylight with diffused, realistic shadows.Ultra-sharp focus, accurate proportions, true-to-life textures, and realistic reflections on glass, fabric, skin, and ground surfaces.Shallow depth of field isolates the subject while preserving environmental realism.High-resolution, premium editorial fashion photography with modern Instagram-style surrealism.Clean composition, flawless realism, and fully believable physical interaction between the screen and the character.
examples.title: 強制透視與一致性：迷你角色融合
examples.commentary: 這個 prompt 使用了強制透視的錯覺，並要求迷你角色和真實人物在各方面保持一致。這展示了如何使用參考圖像來確保風格和外觀的一致性。

examples.prompt: # Role Definition:You are an expert product photographer and creative art director specializing in high-end luxury goods. Your sole task is to generate a photorealistic image of a custom 3D subsurface laser-engraved crystal ornament based on a simple subject provided by the user.# Core Directive:The user will provide only the [Subject]. You must autonomously analyze this subject to determine the most aesthetically appropriate and enhancing configuration for the entire scene. You must decide on the crystal's shape, the base material, the surrounding environment, and the lighting mood to best complement the vibe of the user's subject.# Creative Analysis Logic (Art Director Instructions):Analyze the Vibe: Is the subject elegant (e.g., ballerina, swan), cozy (e.g., sleeping cat, family photo), powerful (e.g., lion, sports car), or architectural?Determine Crystal Shape:Elegant/Tall Subjects -> Use a tall, multi-faceted prism or diamond shape to enhance verticality.Solid/Cozy Subjects -> Use a hefty, thick rectangular block or cube to convey weight and warmth.Dynamic Subjects -> Use complex geometric shapes with many bevels to refract light dramatically.Determine Environment & Lighting:Elegant Vibe: Place it in a luxurious, dark, moody environment (art gallery, velvet study). Use dramatic, cool ambient light contrasting with warmth from the base.Cozy/Warm Vibe: Place it in a homey, soft environment (wooden desk, near a fireplace). Use warm, soft, golden-hour lighting with cozy bokeh.Modern/Tech Vibe: Place it on a sleek, minimalist surface (polished concrete, dark glass). Use clean, neutral lighting.# Image Generation Template (Mandatory Technical Specs):Whatever artistic choices you make based on the logic above, the final image MUST adhere to these technical specifications to ensure a realistic "3D Laser Engraving" look:Engraving Style: The subject inside must NOT look like a solid 3D print. It MUST be described as a "volumetric white point-cloud engraving," having a "frosty, granular, subsurface texture" made of millions of micro-cracks inside the glass.Lighting Interaction: The engraving must "glow brilliantly from within," illuminated entirely by warm, golden LED light originating from the base beneath it.Material: The crystal must be heavy, clear, flawless K9 optical glass with beveled edges that catch and split the light.Photography Style: Cinematic product photograph, macro lens, extremely shallow depth of field (bokeh), 8k resolution, hyper-detailed.# Input Process:I will now provide the subject. You will instantly apply the creative logic and generate the final image.
examples.title: 產品攝影與場景設計：水晶工藝品
examples.commentary: 這個 prompt 定義了 AI 的角色為產品攝影專家，並要求 AI 自主分析主題以確定最佳場景配置。這展示了 AI 在創意決策中的應用。

examples.prompt: {"visual_style_analysis": {"subject": {"description": "Young beautiful Taiwanese woman (台灣年輕漂亮女性)","attributes": ["Long dark straight hair","Fair skin","Soft smiling expression","Approachable demeanor","Elegant leg pose"],"apparel": {"top": "White button-down long-sleeve shirt (business casual)","bottom": "Black mini pencil skirt","shoes": "Black patent leather high heels with ankle straps","style": "Office Lady (OL) look, Smart Casual"}},"composition": {"framing": "Full body shot, slightly low angle","perspective": "Leading lines formed by the sidewalk and building edge","depth_of_field": "Shallow depth of field (Subject in focus, background slightly blurred)","positioning": "Subject seated on steps on the left, open street on the right"},"environment": {"location": "Taiwan urban street corner","key_elements": ["Modern glass storefront with black frames","Green painted pedestrian walkway (distinctive to Taiwan)","Yellow traffic bollards","Parked scooters in background","Blurred 7-Eleven sign in distance"]},"lighting": {"type": "Natural daylight","quality": "Soft, diffused, non-direct sunlight (overcast or shaded area)","direction": "Even illumination on face"},"colors": {"palette": [{ "name": "Crisp White", "hex": "#FFFFFF", "usage": "Shirt" },{ "name": "Jet Black", "hex": "#1A1A1A", "usage": "Skirt, Heels, Building frames" },{ "name": "Street Green", "hex": "#4A8C70", "usage": "Pedestrian lane" },{ "name": "Caution Yellow", "hex": "#F2C94C", "usage": "Bollards" },{ "name": "Skin Tone", "hex": "#FADDD3", "usage": "Skin" }]},"technical_specs": {"camera_style": "DSLR Portrait","focal_length": "85mm or 50mm","aperture": "f/2.8 to f/4","quality": "High resolution, sharp focus, realistic texture"}},"generated_prompt": {"english": "A high-resolution photograph of a young beautiful Taiwanese woman sitting elegantly on the steps of a modern storefront. She has long dark hair, fair skin, and a gentle, friendly smile. She is wearing a crisp white button-down office shirt and a black mini tight skirt with black high heels, embodying a stylish Office Lady (OL) look. The background is a distinct Taiwan street scene featuring a green painted pedestrian walkway, yellow traffic bollards, parked scooters, and a blurred 7-Eleven sign in the distance. Soft natural daylight, shallow depth of field, 85mm portrait lens, realistic textures, cinematic lighting.","chinese_traditional": "一張高解析度的照片，拍攝一位年輕漂亮的台灣女性優雅地坐在現代店面的階梯上。她留著黑色長髮，皮膚白皙，帶著溫柔友善的微笑。她身穿白色長袖襯衫和黑色窄裙，搭配黑色高跟鞋，展現時尚的 OL 職場風格。背景是明顯的台灣街頭景象，有人行道綠色鋪面、黃色防撞桿、停放的機車，遠處有模糊的 7-Eleven 招牌。柔和的自然光，淺景深，85mm 人像鏡頭，真實質感，電影級布光。"},{"ratio": "4:3"}}
examples.title: 人物主體與環境：台灣街頭 OL
examples.commentary: 這個 prompt 詳細描述了人物的外貌、服裝和姿勢，以及周圍的環境。它展示了如何使用多個屬性來定義人物和場景。

examples.title: 台灣街頭人像攝影：場景與人物融合
examples.commentary: 此提示詞結合了人物描述與場景細節，營造出真實的台灣街頭氛圍。利用引導線和景深，將觀者視線集中在主體上。

examples.prompt: Photorealistic real-person portrait, half-body portrait, waist-up shot.Use the uploaded reference image for the subject’s exact face identity, hairstyle, and outfit, keep them consistent and unchanged.Realistic human look only (do NOT turn into anime / illustration / CGI).【角色辨識】Subject must match the uploaded reference image exactly:same face identity and facial proportionssame hairstyle and hair colorsame eyes and overall vibesame outfit and accessories (no redesign, no replacement)some loose strands falling across face,natural skin texture, realistic pores and fine details,eyes with soft catchlight,waist-up composition, single subject.【嬌羞神態八要素】眼神 Eyes: shy downcast eyes, glancing sideways at camera through lowered lashes,avoiding direct gaze, slight eye smile, soft vulnerable look.眉毛 Eyebrows: slightly raised in gentle surprise, soft worried arch,a rare unguarded expression.臉頰 Cheeks: subtle rosy blush on apple of cheeks, natural shy flush,NOT extending to nose, light pink undertones only.嘴唇 Lips: gently biting lower lip, or lips slightly parted in shy hesitation,holding back a small smile, soft and natural.頭部 Head: head tilted down bashfully, chin tucked,face turned slightly away but eyes peeking back at viewer, coy head tilt.肩膀 Shoulders: shoulders raised and turned slightly inward,slightly hunched in a shy posture.手部 Hands: one hand raised near face — covering mouth shyly,or tucking hair behind ear, or fingers touching cheek,small nervous fidgeting gesture.身體語言 Body: turned slightly away as if wanting to hide,timid, reserved upper body language.【嬌羞妝容】Makeup: natural innocent style —realistic dewy skin with a soft glow (not plastic),soft pink shimmery eyeshadow, subtle aegyo-sal highlight,gentle puppy eyeliner, natural lashes,soft feathered brows,subtle blush only on the apple of cheeks,glossy gradient coral lips, fresh and natural.【環境與光線】Background: soft warm bokeh, indoor warm light or sunset golden hour,warm and intimate atmosphere.Light: soft diffused lighting, warm tones, gentle rim light,subject slightly brighter than background.【調色與畫質】Color: warm pink-grey tones, soft romantic atmosphere.Camera/Quality: shallow depth of field (85mm portrait lens look), f/1.8,subject sharp, realistic skin texture, cinematic portrait, subtle film grain.【約束】Constraints: half-body portrait waist-up, single subject,clear face and eyes, no aggressive expression, no battle pose,intimate and soft mood only,photorealistic real human, not illustration, not anime, not CGI, not 3D render.No outfit change. No hairstyle change. No identity change.
examples.title: 參考圖角色一致性與神態控制
examples.commentary: 此提示詞強調使用參考圖保持角色一致性，並詳細描述了人物的神態，利用【角色辨識】確保生成結果與參考圖高度相似。

examples.prompt: Use the uploaded reference image as the character’s only source of appearance. Strictly preserve the same face, including facial features and proportions, skin tone, eye shape, nose shape, lip shape, facial contour, and overall identity. Do not change, stylize, beautify, or swap the face. The person must look exactly like the reference image, converted into a realistic real-life human version.Main Image Generation PromptA photorealistic, real-life human woman, ultra-high realism, cinematic photography style.The character has the exact same face as the reference image, translated into a realistic human appearance, with natural skin texture, soft subsurface scattering, realistic eye reflections, and lifelike facial proportions.She is wearing an elegant black and red Chinese-inspired outfit with a modern, sensual design.The clothing includes a black sleeveless top with red trim, subtle gold ornamental patterns, and a structured bodice that fits closely to the body. A wide decorative waist belt with red braided knots and metallic accessories cinches the waist. The outfit features short layered skirts in black and red, with intricate gold embroidery details.Over the outfit, she wears long, flowing black outer sleeves with a deep red inner lining and ornate gold patterns near the hem, hanging loosely from her arms. She is wearing black lace thigh-high stockings, slightly sheer, and black high-heeled shoes with red accents and ribbon details.Her hair is long, black, and styled into twin ponytails, with straight bangs framing the face. Red ornamental hair accessories and small decorative elements are attached near the ponytails. Her expression is soft and gentle, with a calm, slightly inviting look.She is standing full body, centered in the frame, facing the camera.Her arms are slightly raised and relaxed, palms open, creating a graceful and confident pose.The posture is elegant and balanced, with one leg subtly placed forward.Scene & Camera:Clean, minimal background (studio-style, light neutral or white background)Full-body portrait, vertical compositionEye-level camera angle, slight perspective depthProfessional studio lighting, soft shadows, high dynamic rangeSharp focus, realistic fabric textures, detailed materialsShot on a high-end DSLR camera, 85mm lens look, shallow depth of fieldStyle Keywords:photorealistic, ultra-realistic, real person, cinematic lighting, fashion photography, 8K, highly detailed, natural skin, realistic fabric folds, professional photoshoot, lifelike human
examples.title: 參考圖臉部精準還原與風格轉換
examples.commentary: 此提示詞著重於使用參考圖還原臉部特徵，並將其轉換為寫實風格。強調了臉部細節的精確保留，避免風格化。

examples.prompt: Create a clean, minimalist fashion infographic from an uploaded reference photo of a person.Extract the outfit worn by the person and present only the clothing and accessories, with no body, no mannequin, and no inflated or air-filled shapes.Each clothing item should appear naturally relaxed, as if laid flat on a clean studio surface or gently suspended by gravity, with realistic folds, creases, and fabric drape (hoodies slightly collapsed, jackets softly folded, pants relaxed, shoes resting naturally).Arrange the outfit pieces in a top-to-bottom vertical order (headwear → outerwear → top → bottoms → footwear → accessories), spaced clearly in a calm exploded-view layout.Character IllustrationIn the top-left corner, include a small stylized cartoon / anime-inspired figure of the person from the uploaded reference image:• Wearing the same outfit shown in the breakdown• Standing straight like a collectible action figure• Slightly puffy proportions (soft premium vinyl-toy feel)• Clean shading, minimal facial detailAbove the character, display the name provided by the user:{{PERSON_NAME}}Rules:• Render the text exactly as provided• Do NOT modify, translate, expand, or reinterpret the name• Do NOT generate or infer any additional names• If no name is provided, leave the area blank• Black, clean modern sans-serif typography• No background boxItem Labels & Price TagsFor each clothing item, include:• A thin, clean connector line pointing to the item• A large, highly readable retail-style price tagEach price tag must:• Display the price as the primary visual element (large, bold, instantly readable)• Include the item name in smaller secondary text• Be visually attached to the connector linePrice tag design:• Rectangular or rounded retail tag style• Light neutral background (off-white or light gray)• Dark high-contrast text• Subtle shadow for depth• Price text significantly larger than all other tag textDo not include brand names.Visual Style• Pure white studio background• Soft, even lighting with subtle contact shadows• Editorial fashion-magazine infographic aesthetic• Realistic fabric colors and textures• Clean modern sans-serif typographyComposition• Centered vertical outfit layout• Character illustration anchored in the top-left corner• Strong readability of prices at first glance• Balanced negative space, uncluttered• No props, no decorative elementsOutputUltra-sharp, high-end fashion breakdownSocial-feed optimizedNo watermark.

examples.title: 身份與服裝鎖定：精準還原參考圖
examples.commentary: 這個 prompt 強調了身份和服裝的絕對鎖定，確保生成結果與參考圖完全一致。使用 `ABSOLUTE IDENTITY & OUTFIT LOCK` 強調了鎖定的重要性，並使用負面提示詞避免修改。

examples.prompt: Role:  Time-Traveling Set Designer & Knolling Photographer.Input Year: 2010Phase 1: The Era Analysis (AI to Deduce)1.  Select The "Hero" Gadget: The most iconic, technologically defining invention of that specific year to serve as the centerpiece.Constraint (Historical Safety Check): Verify the date. Do not include technology that was "invented" but not yet in common use. (e.g., For 1255, use a Water Clock or Astrolabe, NOT a weight-driven Mechanical Clock).2.  Select 4-6 "Support" Artifacts: Smaller everyday items from that era (e.g., Wax tablets, Quills, Coins, Tools).3.  Analyze The "Population": Who are the people? How are they dressed? (e.g., Monks in robes, Blacksmiths in aprons, Flappers in dresses).4.  Analyze The Background: What material represents this era? (e.g., Vellum/Parchment for Medieval, Linoleum for 1950s, Circuit Board for Future).Phase 2: Visual ExecutionGoal: A "Living Knolling Grid." A perfectly organized flat-lay where the objects serve as the terrain for a bustling miniature world.1. The Layout (The Grid):Background: A flat surface made of the Era-Appropriate Material identified in Phase 1 (e.g., Aged Parchment).Arrangement: The Hero Gadget (Center) and Support Artifacts (Surrounding) are aligned at perfect 90-degree angles. Organized by size and shape.2. The "Living" Interaction (The Narrative Twist):The Population: Dozens of Tiny Hyper-Realistic Figurines (dressed in strict Era-Accurate clothing) are interacting with the giant objects as if they are buildings or landscape.Action A (Construction): Tiny workers are "building" or "repairing" the Hero Gadget using era-appropriate tools.Action B (Usage): Tiny scholars or users are examining the Support Artifacts (e.g., reading the giant book, sitting on the giant coin).The Spill: Elements of the era (dust, steam, or scrolls) are spilling slightly from the Hero object into the grid.3. The Typography:The Input Year (e.g., "1255") is physically spelled out in the center-bottom of the grid using materials from the era.Examples: Twisted Rope, Carved Wood blocks, Neon Tubes, or Scattered Coffee Beans.4. Atmosphere:Lighting: Soft, shadowless "Wes Anderson" studio lighting (high-key).Perspective: Top-down (Orthographic) view.Vibe: Deconstructed, organized, satisfying, geometric.Output: 1 x image, 4:5 Aspect Ratio, High-End Commercial Photography, "Miniature World" Aesthetic.

examples.prompt: Use the uploaded reference image as the character’s only source of appearance. Strictly preserve the same face, including facial features and proportions, skin tone, hairline, eye shape, nose shape, lip shape, and overall facial contour. Do not swap faces, beautify, age, or alter the character to resemble anyone else. The clothing, hairstyle, and body proportions must exactly match the reference image.Image Generation Prompt (Appearance & Outfit Matched)Ultra-realistic surreal conceptual portrait of a young woman with exactly the same face, hairstyle, and outfit as the uploaded reference image, trapped inside a transparent snow globe as if sealed in a tiny frozen world.The snow globe is oversized, upright, and centered on a dark reflective surface, featuring a realistic curved glass dome and a detailed black base. Inside the globe, fine snow particles swirl slowly in the air and lightly collect around her legs and shoulders. A miniature winter environment surrounds her—small icy trees, cracked frozen ground, and a faint glowing streetlamp in the distance, creating a cold, isolated atmosphere.The young woman is wearing the same white long-sleeve button-up shirt, blue plaid bow tie, matching blue plaid pleated skirt, and sheer black stockings as seen in the reference image. Her long, straight dark hair with soft bangs remains neat and consistent with the original appearance.She is crouched slightly with her knees drawn in, body language tense and constrained by the limited space. Her facial expression is emotional yet subtle—eyes glossy, lips gently pressed together, conveying quiet distress rather than exaggeration. Both palms are pressed outward against the inner glass surface, fingers spread, with realistic glass refraction and distortion bending her hands and facial features.Cold cinematic lighting from the upper left creates sharp highlights on the curved glass, strong reflections, and soft internal shadows. Volumetric light beams cut through the swirling snow, revealing floating particles and icy air. Dark moody gradient background, minimal surroundings, strong contrast, shallow depth of field, hyper-detailed skin texture, realistic glass refraction, ultra-sharp focus, professional surreal conceptual photography style, 8K quality, vertical composition, dramatic emotional mood, surreal realism.

examples.prompt: Use the uploaded reference image as the character’s only source of appearance. Strictly preserve the exact same face and identity, including facial proportions, bone structure, skin tone, eye shape and color, nose shape, lip shape, jawline, hairline, and overall facial contour. Do not beautify, stylize, de-age, or alter the face. Do not make the person resemble any other real or fictional individual. The identity must remain identical to the reference photo.A full-body photorealistic portrait of a young woman standing on a quiet beach at sunset, captured in a cinematic, natural photography style.She has long, dark brown hair with soft natural waves, gently lifted by the sea breeze, with loose side bangs framing her face. Her facial expression is warm and relaxed, showing a natural, friendly smile. Her skin texture is realistic with natural details, soft highlights, and subtle shadows. She wears small elegant dangling earrings and a delicate gold necklace.She is wearing a fitted red ribbed turtleneck sweater made of thick knit fabric, clearly showing realistic textile texture and folds. She pairs it with a high-waisted navy blue plaid midi skirt, featuring a belt with a round gold buckle and decorative buttons along the waist. The skirt flows naturally with gravity and wind. On her feet are dark brown lace-up ankle boots with visible leather texture and stitching.Her pose is casual and natural: one hand lifted behind her head, elbow bent, slightly touching her hair, while the other arm rests loosely by her side. Her body is slightly turned at an angle, giving a candid, lifestyle photography feel.The environment is a realistic sandy beach shoreline with gentle waves washing up near her feet. The ocean stretches into the distance, reflecting warm sunset light. In the far background, a line of evergreen trees is softly blurred.The sun is low near the horizon, producing golden hour lighting, warm rim light around her hair and shoulders, soft lens flare, and natural atmospheric glow.Negative Promptanime, illustration, cartoon, painting, drawing, stylized, unrealistic skin, porcelain skin, doll-like face, exaggerated eyes, deformed body, bad anatomy, extra fingers, extra limbs, blurred face, face distortion, plastic skin, over-smoothing, AI artifacts, low resolution, oversharpened, harsh lighting
examples.title: 身份鎖定：確保生成人物與參考圖完全一致
examples.commentary: 這個提示詞示範了如何使用詳細的描述來鎖定人物身份，確保生成的人物與參考圖在臉部特徵和身份上完全一致。避免了美化、風格化等修改。

examples.prompt: Style: Chronophotography / Stroboscopic action sequence, cinematic sports realism.Identity / Character Reference: Use the person from the uploaded reference photo as the ONLY appearance source, strict identity lock (same face, hairstyle, skin tone, body proportions). Keep the original outfit from the reference image (no redesign, no new accessories).Composition: Multiple instances of the same person appear across the frame in a left-to-right sequence, depicting a full pitching motion on the baseball mound. Each “clone” captures a different phase of the movement: set position → leg lift → stride → arm cocking → ball release → follow-through.Action: The subject is throwing a powerful baseball pitch from the pitcher’s mound toward home plate. Strong athletic posture, explosive torque, planted lead foot, rotating hips and shoulders, arm whipping forward at release, intense focus and competitive expression. The final frame shows the follow-through with maximum momentum and body extension.Environment: Professional baseball stadium or clean outdoor baseball field, pitcher’s mound clay texture, white pitching rubber visible, home plate and catcher far in the background, stadium lights or crowd bokeh optional.Visuals / Motion Effect: Stroboscopic afterimages (“ghost trails”) follow the pitching motion arc. The most recent pose (ball release / follow-through) is the sharpest and most detailed; earlier poses are semi-transparent, slightly blurred, with realistic motion trails and time-lapse echo.Ball & Motion Detail: The baseball is visible as a clean motion path streak, with multiple faint ball positions across the release arc, showing speed and trajectory (no cartoon effects).Lighting: Dramatic golden hour stadium lighting or bright daytime sports lighting, strong highlights on the subject, realistic shadows on the mound, cinematic contrast.Camera / Cinematic Look: Slight low-angle from in front-left of the mound looking toward the pitcher, medium-wide shot capturing full body and motion sequence, high-detail textures (clay, jersey fabric, skin texture), shallow depth of field with background blur.Keywords: chronophotography, stroboscopic effect, motion trails, time-lapse, pitching sequence, baseball mound, fastball throw, visual echo, cinematic sports action.aspect ratio: 4:3
examples.title: 連續動作捕捉：時間切片與身份鎖定
examples.commentary: 此提示詞結合了時間切片攝影風格和身份鎖定技術，將同一人物在不同時間點的動作呈現在同一畫面中。同時保留了參考圖中的服裝。

examples.prompt: {"style_name": "StudioToy3D_Tabletop_GoldenRatio_StrictPhotoIsolation","prompt": "Studio-toy / Apple Memoji–inspired stylized 3D bobblehead character based strictly on the uploaded photo, extremely high facial likeness and identity lock, preserve original facial proportions, bone structure, eye spacing, nose, lips, jawline, and expression, no face drift, cute but not realistic, clean minimal geometry, rounded forms, matte materials, oversized head (1.5–1.8x), balanced medium-height body (not chibi, not short), smooth simplified skin, large expressive but accurate eyes, fully stylized sculpted 3D hair with chunky shapes and soft volume (no strands, no realism), hairstyle and color matching the photo, stylized 3D clothing with simplified shapes and clean edges (no fabric texture), vinyl designer-toy aesthetic. The scene is a clean tabletop arrangement composed using the Golden Ratio (Fibonacci spiral): the bobblehead figure is the primary focal element, a framed photograph of the original uploaded image is a secondary element, and a stylized flower vase balances the composition as a tertiary element. The framed photograph is a strictly separate object and must remain a flat, 2D photographic print only. The image inside the frame must remain completely unchanged from the original uploaded photo: no 3D stylization, no bobblehead effect, no character transformation, no exaggeration, no reinterpretation, no sculpting, and no depth. The bobblehead character must exist only as the standalone 3D figure outside the frame. Under no circumstances should the bobblehead face, 3D style, proportions, or materials appear inside the framed photo. The photo frame itself uses the same matte material and color as the background, but the photo content remains purely photographic. The flower vase is minimal and sculpted, using the same color and matte material as the background. Professional studio 3D render, soft even lighting, shallow depth of field, solid light contrasting background color, cohesive color harmony, balanced negative space, collectible designer-toy scene, high quality","negative_prompt": "3d face in photo frame, bobblehead inside frame, stylized photo, cartoon photo, reinterpret photo, face duplication, face bleeding, identity merging, shared facial features, character portrait in frame, depth inside frame, sculpted photo, photorealistic 3d inside frame, anime, chibi, short body, distorted proportions, realistic hair strands, fabric texture, pores, cluttered scene, noisy background","likeness_priority": "very_high","material_style": "matte_vinyl","hair_style": "sculpted_stylized_3d","clothing_style": "simplified_stylized_3d","body_proportion": "medium_balanced","scene_type": "tabletop_arrangement","composition": {"layout": "golden_ratio","method": "fibonacci_spiral","identity_isolation": "absolute","focal_hierarchy": ["bobblehead_3d_character","framed_original_photo","flower_vase"]},"props": {"framed_photo": {"content": "original_uploaded_image","photo_type": "flat_2d_photograph_only","frame_color": "same_as_background","frame_material": "matte_vinyl","identity_rules": "no_3d_no_stylization_no_face_transfer_no_depth","placement": "secondary_golden_ratio_point"},"flower_vase": {"flower_type": "any_simple_flower","vase_color": "same_as_background","material": "matte_vinyl","placement": "tertiary_golden_ratio_point"}},"background": {"color": "light_contrasting","style": "solid"},"render_style": "clean_studio_toy","quality": "high"}

examples.prompt: {"name": "Skywriter Architect [Nano Banana Pro]","description": "A specialized visual engine that generates ultra-realistic aviation photography features airplane smoke trails forming specific shapes/images over landmarks. No text output, only images.","system_instructions": {"role": "You are the 'Nano Banana Pro' visual engine. Your ONLY function is to generate high-fidelity, 4K photorealistic images based on user inputs. You possess professional knowledge of aviation photography, aerobatics, and atmospheric perspective.","input_processing_logic": {"case_text_input": "If the user provides a location and a text description of a shape (e.g., 'Great Wall of China, Dragon'), use 'Dragon' as the smoke trail pattern.","case_image_input": "If the user uploads an image, analyze the core subject/silhouette of the image. Extract the visual essence (e.g., if a photo of a logo is uploaded, the pattern is 'a giant sky-writing of the logo'). Use this extracted subject as the smoke trail pattern."},"prompt_construction_template": {"style": "Ultra-realistic 4K aviation photography, daytime, crystal clear blue sky, telephoto lens compression, high shutter speed, cinematic composition.","action": "A squadron of precision stunt planes or fighter jets flying in formation across the sky. They are emitting thick, vibrant colored smoke (red, blue, yellow, etc.). The smoke trails weave together to form the distinct, colossal shape of [PATTERN/IMAGE_SUBJECT] floating in the air.","details": "The smoke shape must look volumetric and fluffy, like real clouds/gas, with natural wind diffusion and sunlight highlighting the texture. It must NOT look like a flat sticker. Visible jets/planes leading the smoke lines.","environment": "Set directly above [LANDMARK]. It is a bright, sunny day with high visibility. The sky is a deep azure blue to contrast with the colorful smoke. If the landmark is urban, show the city layout below in daylight. Shadows of the smoke clouds might be faintly visible on the ground/structures if the angle permits.","tech_specs": "8k resolution, highly detailed, photorealistic, ray tracing, unreal engine 5 render style, vivid colors."},"operational_rules": ["1. NEVER output conversational text, explanations, or descriptions. Your output must be the generated image ONLY.","2. If the user does not specify a location, default to a generic 'green open field' or 'blue ocean'.","3. Ensure the smoke pattern looks like it is made of gas/vapor (volumetric), adhering to physics with slight dissipation at the edges.","4. Immediately trigger the image generation tool with the constructed prompt."]},"example_interaction": {"user_input": "Mount Fuji, A Samurai Helmet","internal_process": "Constructing prompt: Ultra-realistic photo of Mount Fuji in sunny daylight. Jets flying over leaving red and white smoke trails forming a giant Samurai Helmet shape in the blue sky...","output": "[GENERATED IMAGE ONLY]"}}

examples.prompt:
{"prompt": "Use facial features of the attached photo. A hyper-realistic, high-fashion holiday editorial photograph featuring one adult woman, styled in a luxury gift-themed concept with a playful yet polished couture aesthetic.

Subject:
One adult woman with long, flowing, wavy black hair, glossy and voluminous, cascading over her shoulders and down her back. Her makeup is refined and editorial: smooth luminous skin, softly contoured cheeks, defined brows, subtle smoky eyes, long lashes, and a natural rose-toned lip. Her expression is calm, confident, and poised, looking directly toward the camera.

Wardrobe & Styling:
She wears a sleek two-piece fitted ensemble in a vibrant solid red tone, clean-lined and modern, emphasizing a fashion editorial look rather than costume styling. The outfit is minimal, structured, and elegant. No excessive accessories—styling remains refined and contemporary.

Pose & Composition:
The woman kneels gracefully inside a large transparent gift box, hands resting confidently on her hips. Her posture is upright and composed, creating a strong sculptural silhouette. Full-body vertical composition with the subject centered and clearly framed by the box.

Environment & Set Design:
A festive indoor holiday setting styled like a luxury campaign set. The transparent gift box is wrapped with bold red satin ribbons and topped with an oversized red bow. A decorated Christmas tree stands beside the box, adorned with neutral metallic ornaments and soft warm lights. Wrapped gifts in coordinating colors are arranged neatly around the base. The floor is wooden with a plush white faux-fur rug inside the box.

Lighting & Atmosphere:
Soft, diffused studio lighting evenly illuminates the subject and environment. Highlights enhance skin texture, fabric smoothness, and the reflective surfaces of the gift box. Shadows are gentle and controlled, maintaining a clean, high-end editorial finish.

Color Palette:
Rich red ribbons, clear acrylic tones, soft white, warm wood neutrals, subtle metallic accents, and natural skin tones.

Style Keywords:
Ultra-photorealistic, luxury holiday fashion editorial, studio photography, modern festive styling, high-detail realism, clean composition, no anime, no illustration, no CGI, no 3D render.

Aspect Ratio: 4:5 (Vertical)

Camera: Full-frame DSLR or mirrorless
Lens: 50mm prime
Aperture: f/4
Shutter Speed: 1/160s
ISO: 100
Focus: Sharp focus on subject with clean background clarity
White Balance: Neutral studio daylight
Resolution: Ultra-high resolution with crisp detail in skin, fabric, and props","aspect_ratio": "4:5","style": "hyper-realistic photography","negative_prompt": "costume, cartoon, anime, illustration, 3D render, CGI, blurry, low quality, deformed, extra limbs, accessories overload, text, watermark, overexposed, underexposed"}

examples.prompt:
①人物の写真をアップロード

②スマホに映したい画像をアップロード

③この JSON をそのまま貼る

{

"edit_type": "extreme_wide_angle_phone_edit",

"source": {

"_hint": "元画像の人物・服・雰囲気を編集するベース。新キャラ禁止。",

"mode": "EDIT",

"reference_images": {

"first": "base_photo_person_and_environment",

"second": "screen_content_for_phone"

},

"preserve_from_first": {

"_hint": "顔・髪型・服装は必ず同一人物として扱うための固定。",

"same_person_or_group": true,

"same_faces": true,

"same_hairstyles": true,

"same_outfits": true,

"same_environment_style": true

}

},

"identity": {

"_hint": "表情の統一化。人物のアイデンティティを崩さず保持。",

"keep_identity_consistent": true,

"all_people_clearly_recognizable_as_original": true,

"expression": "bright_natural_smile"

},

"camera_effect": {

"_hint": "スマホを近づけたときの誇張パースを美しく安定化。",

"perspective": "extreme_wide_angle",

"style": "dynamic_photorealistic",

"near_objects_appear_large": true,

"far_objects_recede_dramatically": true,

"allow_view_from_above_or_below": true

},

"pose": {

"_hint": "元画像と同じポーズ禁止。手の動きを強調して破綻防止。",

"pose_can_change": true,

"must_be_completely_different_from_reference": true,

"do_not_replicate_or_approximate_original_pose": true,

"style_tags": [

"stylish",

"complex",

"fluid",

"powerful"

],

"focus_on_expressive_hands": true,

"avoid_arm_distortion": true,

"allow_multiple_body_parts_near_lens": true

},

"phone": {

"_hint": "スマホ専用領域。持ち方・向き・手元の自然さを定義。",

"allowed": true,

"holding_styles": [

"one_handed",

"two_handed",

"low_angle",

"high_angle",

"tilted",

"sideways",

"near_chest",

"near_hip",

"casual_carry",

"partially_toward_lens"

],

"rules": {

"_hint": "“レンズに向ける強制”を避け、自然な持ち方で画面が見える構図へ。",

"each_person_may_hold_one_phone": true,

"priority_is_natural_and_relaxed_body_structure": true,

"do_not_force_phone_directly_toward_camera": true,

"screen_should_be_naturally_visible_when_possible": true

}

},

"screen_replacement": {

"_hint": "差し替えスクリーン。UIなし・歪みなし・自然な貼り込み。",

"target": "visible_phone_screen",

"use_second_reference_image_as_content": true,

"overlay_cleanly_on_visible_screen_area": true,

"fit_without_distortion": true,

"respect_screen_shape": true,

"no_additional_cropping": true,

"ui_constraints": {

"_hint": "SNSバーやアプリ枠の発生を完全禁止。",

"no_ui": true,

"no_icons": true,

"no_status_bar": true,

"no_app_frame": true,

"show_only_content_from_second_reference": true

}

},

"environment": {

"_hint": "元写真の空気感を保つが、季節や天気には依存しない汎用設計。",

"preserve_environment_style_from_reference": true,

"lighting_consistent_with_reference": true,

"expand_space_for_wide_angle_view": true,

"keep_texture_and_color_tone_consistent": true

},

"composition": {

"_hint": "スマホ近接によるダイナミック構図の安定化。",

"dynamic_but_readable": true,

"extreme_depth_emphasis": true,

"allow_phone_close_to_lens": true,

"keep_all_people_visually_balanced": true

},

"constraints": {

"_hint": "意図せぬ変化を禁止する保護設定。",

"no_new_characters": true,

"no_change_in_age_or_gender_presentation": true,

"no_costume_change": true,

"no_change_to_reference_location_type": true,

"respect_original_photographic_style": true

}

}
